sellerCard.description:
I am a professional Developer, Designer, Branding Expert, Marketer, Server Administrator, Network Engineer etc.

I am available for any type of Task/Project related to listed Gigs or you can request if you have any Custom Requirements. Thanks. :)

description.content:
A professional, eye-catching, highly interactive and appealing Website Design and Website Development is guaranteed. I promise to provide my best service and 1 week free support to Kick-start Your Business. üöÄ


‚úÖWhat will be included:

1. Fully Responsive Website as per your requirements.

2. Friendly & Easy to Use Admin Panel.

3- Call To Action.

4. Best design and layout revisions until 100% satisfaction.

5. 100% Search Engine Friendly URL structure.

6. On-Page SEO and Rich Snippets setup.

7. Special attention to UI/UX.

8. Visually attractive Graphical Layout.

9. Enhanced Security.

10. Speed Optimization.

11. Automated Backups.

12. Social Media Integration, Contact Forms, Google Maps, Newsletter Subscription & Mailing list.

And a lot more. . .


üåêCMS (Content Management Systems): WordPress, Drupal, Joomla, Wix, Weebly, Squarespace, Sitebuilder, Custom etc.


*If you don‚Äôt know which package is right for you, or if you have any type of custom requirements or queries then contact me. I will provide the free consultancy for your projects. :)

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do you need to get started?
questionsAndAnswers.answer:
- Basic: Information of your Domain and Hosting.
- Premium: Information of the Issue which you are facing.
- Pro: We will need your domain name and hosting details. If you don't have these yet, we can assist you on the process. We'll also need your official logo and the main details of your company.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do I need to contact you before placing the order?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, that will be a smart move :) This will make sure that both of us are on the same page!

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can I contact you later if I have any problems with the site?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Of course you can! We know that sometimes things happens. We will do everything to help you, so feel free to contact us here on Fiverr.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you offer online website/store management, maintenance, upgrades, customization services?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, we offer online website/store management, maintenance, upgrades, customization services on monthly basis.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you offer custom theme design and plugin development services?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, we do offer the custom theme design and plugin development services.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will you host my website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, we offer website hosting too on additional pricing.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you take custom order?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, we take custom order on the basis of your requirements.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can I get extra fast delivery?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, you can get extra fast delivery for an additional fee.

reviews.comment: Amit was great. He went above and beyond and really worked with me to answer all my questions and concerns.
Wow. I am blown away with competency and a quick delivery. I will be ordering again.
Working with Awais was fantastic, we had a complex and big project which he was always delivering great solutions very fast and professional! Would highly recommend his services!

The cooperation with awaisch1 was absolutely outstanding! The communication was super fast and the orders were completed in record time. He even made extra short notice working time at night so we could finish our project on time. In addition to his efficiency, he also brought fresh ideas to the project and implemented all of our requests perfectly. He is extremely solution-oriented and courteous. I highly recommend working with him and look forward to future projects with him!
